text: ECW can mean: *Extreme Championship Wrestling (originally Eastern Championship Wrestling), a professional wrestling company that ran from 1992 until 2001. *ECW (WWE), a brand ran by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It was based on the original company. *Electronic counter-warfare, a counter-measurement used by the military. *English Civil War, multiple different conflicts in England from 1642 to 1651.
title: ECW
